title: Borsalino logo
content:
Hi Typophiles

I am working on a logo and is inspired by this Borsalino logo. Do you have any tips for a font I could use as a sketch? or perhaps a similar italic that looks a bit like the Borsalino logo?

Looking forward to hear your great advices!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Logo\_Borsalino\_Ufficiale-bis.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090607101911/http:/typophile.com/files/Logo_Borsalino_Ufficiale-bis.jpg) | 8.14 KB |
author: jaksi

comments.content: Berthold Englische Schreibschrift Two seems to be close for example …
Cool! That will get me started right. Thanx
